answers.answer: Was it your choice to be induced at 39 weeks? Is it for health reasons? The reason I am asking is that I really do not want to go over my due date and it would be great if I can get induced at 39 weeks or due date if my baby doesn't come on his own..but I 've been told, they wouldn't induce before 41 weeks :=(

@rourou1985, it was my choice to get induced, my due date is Nov 11th. That's so weird, I've read other posts about other ladies not being able to get induced until they're 40 weeks! Yikes!! 41 weeks is too long!! =/
Yea that's long im having my baby at 39 weeks!  Which is next Friday
Thank you and congrats to you also♡

I've even heard some places don't induce until 42w...I am getting induced on the 13th evening & will most likely birth on 14th , I'm due 15th.But I am getting induced because I have Gestational Diabetes.. they don't want me to go overdue.:)I am so happy, it is LITTERALLY the ONLY positive thing that comes with Gestational Diabetes.And hey,congeatulations mamaz1121 !!Soon you'll have your baby! :DYay!!! :D(Even though it is soon my turn I am a teeny tiny bit jealous! :) )

Congratulations ladies!! You must be so excited..I talked to my doctor, she said, the earliest I can start scheduling for induction is 22 of december!!! I  due 15th of december!! Then, she said, we won't let you go past 29th of December though! Oh really, thank you very much! That's nice, since I feel like I am going to be pregnant forever!It is incredibly frustrating, because I am petite and I extra weight is killing my back and I have been feeling tired , having little sleep, back pain and I.am only 34 weeks and few days! Thinking that it may take me another 7 or 8 weeks to meet my baby :)
I'm due DEC 1 my doctor asked me. I said after the Turkey meal so I will be getting induced Nov 28. I'm 36 weeks and I am tiredddd! I can't wait to be saying 39 weeks its coming soon tho!
I will be induced tomorrow because gd, i wish you the best. I will be praying for you and your baby
Good luck to all you mommas with pending inductions! Hope everything goes safely & exceeds your expectations!

question: 39 weeks pregnant and getting induced tomorrow at 6:30am. Finally I get to meet my little man!! :)
title: finally the day has come! :)
